name: Onmund's Request
description: Onmund asks for help recovering a family amulet he regrets selling. The trail leads into the College's gray-market politics (and possibly local Winterhold resentment).

objectives.text: Identify who currently holds the amulet (Enthir / black-market contact).
Recover the amulet: negotiate, trade, steal, or win it.
Return the amulet to Onmund (or decide its fate).

items: Onmund's Amulet (aspect hook; optional minor warding benefit)
rewards.notes: Completing this quest unlocks Onmund as a stable companion pick for dangerous expeditions.

gm_notes: Great place to introduce Enthir, quiet College corruption, and 'neutral institution' hypocrisy. If PC leans noble/political, this can become a leverage scene.
